## fieldctl notifier run

Run notifier daemon

```
fieldctl notifier run [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --channel string   channel name (default "cf-events")
      --dsn string       redis DSN
  -h, --help             help for run
      --mode string      broker mode (default "redis")
```
